title: OpenBSD failure
body:
I tried to start the OpenBSD builder back up, but it no longer runs.

New OS version requirement?  http://code.google.com/p/go-wiki/wiki/OpenBSD says OpenBSD
5+.  I'm running 5.0.

$ hg id
cbce1b576493 tip
$ uname -a
OpenBSD gopenbsd.my.domain 5.0 GENERIC#71 amd64
$ ./all.bash
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool for host, openbsd/amd64.
lib9
libbio
libmach
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
/home/go/go/pkg/obj/openbsd_amd64/libmach.a(sym.o)(.text+0x1d67): In function `syminit':
/home/go/go/src/libmach/sym.c:303: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
cmd/cov
/home/go/go/pkg/obj/openbsd_amd64/libmach.a(sym.o)(.text+0x1d67): In function `syminit':
/home/go/go/src/libmach/sym.c:303: warning: strcpy() is almost always misused, please
use strlcpy()
